pageProps.title: react-native-camera拍照图片自动旋转
pageProps.body:
[Android: captured image is always rotated](https://github.com/react-native-camera/react-native-camera/issues/1807)
[taking photos in landscape mode is rotating the photo 90º (turning to portrait)](https://github.com/react-native-camera/react-native-camera/issues/1570)
